comments.body:
This looks fine, although it's N^2 for the plural resources. 

Maybe hoist the function out of the loop and make pluralRegexp a global? Not to remedy N^2, just to make the loop body a little smaller.

The function closes over `resources`, so hoisting it up would require that I pass more context as parameters. I'm not worried about N^2 at all. This script runs for <0.5s. The advantage of having all the logic in one place outweighs greatly the performance benefits.
